post.title: Munching For Music at Burger King
post.description: Dear Band Families, Our March Munching for Music will allow you to give your family a meal that’s fi
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

Our March Munching for Music will allow you to give your family a meal that’s fit for royalty – at Burger King Please visit the North Royalton Burger King, located at 5702 Royalton Road on March 13th from 5-8 pm. This is right in the heart of town near the intersection or Royalton and State Roads. You need to turn in a coupon from our flyer to have the band get credit, so please remember to do that. Our band will receive 20% of all sales during that time as long as the coupon is presented. Definitely carry one of these coupons with you when you go to Burger King so that your order will help the band. Take a coupon please! Turn in the coupon please!  Did I mention they require us to use coupons? I think you get it. Here are the important points for this fundraiser:

  • Munching for Music at the North Royalton Burger King.   
  • Tuesday, March 13, 2018
  • 5-8 pm
  • Take along and present a coupon from the flyer.

Please print off the attached flyer or you can pick up individual coupons in the band room near the white band box. Please tell your kids, families, and friends to eat at Burger King on March 13th!

Thank you for supporting the band!
